LABEL: 0x58
ENG: "Mister Takahara! Good day to you, sir!"

LABEL: 0xb6
JPN: 直立した２人が深々と礼をする。
ENG: Tenzen and Ryouichi bowed deeply as they greeted me.

LABEL: 0x10c
JPN: 「地元じゃそうとうな悪だったみたいで」
ENG: "Word has reached us that you had a fair share of troubles back home."

LABEL: 0x15a
JPN: 「俺らそんなことしらず、数々の無礼をっ」
ENG: "And we, in our ignorance, were downright insolent!"

LABEL: 0x1aa
ENG: "You really got suspended? Dude, that's friggin' crazy!"

LABEL: 0x1fc
JPN: なんで早速、噂が広がっているんだ。
ENG: How's it even possible for a rumor to spread that fast?

LABEL: 0x302
JPN: 「お前もなかなかのやんちゃボーイみたいだが」
ENG: "Looks like you're quite the delinquent. But that said..."

LABEL: 0x356
ENG: "I've got a few stories that can't be beat!"

LABEL: 0x386
JPN: 「基本的にいつでも、公序良俗に反してるもんな」
ENG: "No surprise there, considering you're more or less a walking violation of public order."

LABEL: 0x3de
JPN: 「万引きしようと思えばできるなっていつも思ってたけど、ここの駄菓子屋がそのせいで潰れたら困るから勘弁してやろうと思ってたほどなんだぜ」
ENG: "I'm such a delinquent I could totally shoplift if I really wanted to, even though I don't 'cause I'd feel bad if the candy shop went out of business thanks to it!"

LABEL: 0x47c
ENG: "You're not describing a delinquent, you're describing a decent person!"

LABEL: 0x4c6
JPN: 「ちなみにあそこのばーさん、すごい目が良いから、万引き成功率ゼロらしいぞ」
ENG: "As a side note, the old lady who runs the store has incredible eyesight, so nobody's ever successfully shoplifted from her."

LABEL: 0x538
JPN: 「見つけたら３歳児でも容赦なく警察に突き出すらしいし」
ENG: "Apparently, she'd even report a three-year-old to the police if she caught them stealing."

LABEL: 0x586
ENG: "Wait, does that mean a three-year-old's tried to steal from her before...?"

LABEL: 0x5c0
JPN: 「天善は何かないのか。悪自慢」
ENG: "What about you, Tenzen? Have any mischief that you're proud of?"

LABEL: 0x656
JPN: 「が、これを告白して、お前らに軽蔑されないだろうか」
ENG: "But I'm sure you'd hold me in the greatest of scorn if I ever admitted to them."

LABEL: 0x6a2
JPN: 「ハードルあげにかかったぞ」
ENG: "Way to set the bar high for yourself."

LABEL: 0x6e8
JPN: 「これはしょーもないパターンだな」
ENG: "It's totally gonna be super petty, isn't it?"

LABEL: 0x732
JPN: 「いや。むしろ軽蔑されるべきなのかもしれないな、俺は」
ENG: "No. If anything, I deserve to be held in scorn because of it."

LABEL: 0x790
ENG: "Scorn is only fitting for the likes of me..."

LABEL: 0x7d4
JPN: 「早くしゃべれ」$d$w「早くしゃべれ」

LABEL: 0x864
JPN: 「試合の相手が怪我をしていたんだ」
ENG: "I was playing a match against an injured opponent."

LABEL: 0x8ae
JPN: 「そこを攻めれば勝てると分かっていた。が、それは違うような気がする」
ENG: "I knew that I could win if I targeted their injury, but it just didn't feel right!"

LABEL: 0x91a
JPN: 「いや勝負というのはそういうものだ」
ENG: "But on the other hand, that's just the nature of competition!"

LABEL: 0x966
JPN: 「あえて攻めることこそ、相手に対する礼儀じゃないのか」
ENG: "If anything it'd be rude to not try and utilize my advantages, wouldn't it!?"

LABEL: 0xa38
ENG: "At least warn us if you're gonna shout like that!"

LABEL: 0xb1c
ENG: "And I had to forfeit the match."

LABEL: 0xb98
ENG: "I'm an evil that deserves to be scorned!"

LABEL: 0xc14
JPN: 「どうやら……とっておきの悪が揃ったようだな」
ENG: "Looks like we're a trio of real villains, huh?"

LABEL: 0xce4
JPN: いったん解散して、昼食後、改めて落ち合うことになった。
ENG: We decided to split up for the moment and meet back up again after lunch.

LABEL: 0xd2a
JPN: しろはのじーさんは、かなりのコワモテらしい。
ENG: From what I could gather, Shiroha's grandfather was quite the ferocious opponent.

LABEL: 0xd66
JPN: けど、今の俺……俺達には、不安はなかった。
ENG: But I wasn't worried. No, we weren't worried.

LABEL: 0xda0
JPN: 俺達には、少々の悪もいとわない若さと、そして友情があったから。
ENG: After all, we had the power of friendship and the courage to commit petty non-crimes on our side.

LABEL: 0xe6e
JPN: 時間になって、集合場所の駄菓子屋の前にやってきた。
ENG: The time came, and I arrived at our meeting place―the candy store.

LABEL: 0xec8
JPN: すでに、しろはが来ていた。

LABEL: 0x10c4
JPN: 「自分のじーさんをよくそこまで」
ENG: "That's quite something to say about your own grandfather."

LABEL: 0x1126
JPN: 「いくら怖いっていってもおじーさんだろ。こっちは情けないけど、若いの３人でいくんだ」
ENG: "No matter how scary he is, he's still an old man, right? I know it's kinda pathetic, but I'll have two other young'ins backing me up."

LABEL: 0x11dc
JPN: ……でも、おじーさん、俺のことも知ってるらしいからな。
ENG: ...On the other hand, he apparently knew about my situation.

LABEL: 0x1222
JPN: 素行不良で停学くらっているなんていう情報が知れてたら、のっけから印象はよくないよな。
ENG: If he knew I'd been suspended for bad behavior, he'd be coming into the conversation biased against me from the outset.

LABEL: 0x1326
ENG: "That doesn't freak you out, or anything?"

LABEL: 0x1392
JPN: 「だいたいイメージ通りだったから」
ENG: "I figured it was something along those lines, so not really."

LABEL: 0x13f0
JPN: 「そんなイメージだったんだ」
ENG: "Do I give off that sort of impression?"

LABEL: 0x1458
JPN: 「そんな俺とよく仲良くしてくれたな」
ENG: "I'm amazed you get along with me so well, considering."

LABEL: 0x14d8
JPN: 「う、ううん。別に仲良くはしてない……」
ENG: "I-I mean, no! It's not like I get along with you particularly well..."

LABEL: 0x1790
ENG: It was already twenty minutes past our meeting time.

LABEL: 0x1816
JPN: 謎の女の子が来た。誰だ。
ENG: An unfamiliar girl came walking up to me. Who's she?

LABEL: 0x18c0
JPN: 「数時間でずいぶん……変わったな」
ENG: "Woah, you've really changed a lot in the last few hours!"

LABEL: 0x18fc
JPN: なにかと変な奴だったし、こんなこともあるか。
ENG: He―she?―was a pretty weird person to begin with, so I guess this isn't beyond the pale?

LABEL: 0x19d4
JPN: 「兄は肌にかぶれものができたらしく」

LABEL: 0x1a12
JPN: 「苦しみもだえ、はってでも行こうとした兄を私が止めて、かわりにこうしてご挨拶に伺った次第です」
ENG: "Even though he was writhing in agony, he was still determined to meet with you, even if he had to crawl, so I had no choice but to stop him and come here to deliver the news in his place."

LABEL: 0x1a8a
JPN: なんの心配も感じさせない、暗記文を読み上げるような顔をして少女は言った。
ENG: She recited the story in an unconcerned monotone, almost like she'd memorized it from a script.

LABEL: 0x1b14
JPN: 「妹が言うのもなんですが、敏感肌の兄ですから」
ENG: "This may sound strange coming from his little sister, but he has extremely sensitive skin."

LABEL: 0x1ba4
JPN: 「そうだ、おにーちゃんってどうしていつも半裸なの」
ENG: "Oh, right. Why's your brother always running around half-naked?"

LABEL: 0x1c12
JPN: 「昔私を助けようとして……あの人は……」
ENG: "A long time ago... In order to save me, he..."

LABEL: 0x1d34
JPN: 「天井からつり下がったまま脱出できなくなった奴の姿が思い浮かぶ」
ENG: "For some reason I have this really clear image in my head of him hanging upside down from the ceiling, totally stuck."

LABEL: 0x1d9e
JPN: 「それじゃあただのあほだよ」
ENG: "Only a complete idiot could end up in a situation like that."

LABEL: 0x1dd4
JPN: 「いや。きっと、そんなところだろう」
ENG: "No, really, I'd bet money it's something along those lines."

LABEL: 0x1f54
JPN: 結局……１５分経っても、天善は現れない。
ENG: We waited for fifteen more minutes, but there was still no sign of Tenzen.

LABEL: 0x201c
ENG: The summer sun was blindingly bright.

LABEL: 0x203c
JPN: ３人ではしゃいでいたのが、遠い昔のようだ。
ENG: Those days when the three of us fooled around together suddenly seemed like a distant memory.

LABEL: 0x20da
JPN: 「考えてみれば……あんなの、いないほうが気が楽だ」
ENG: "Now that I think about it... It'll probably be easier without them anyway."

LABEL: 0x2138
JPN: そもそも皆面白がって、めちゃくちゃ言うから、変に想像だけ膨らんでいるんだ。
ENG: I'm only so tense in the first place 'cause everyone keeps telling me all this weird crap about him to mess with me.

LABEL: 0x2192
ENG: I mean, c'mon, the guy's over seventy years old, y'know?

LABEL: 0x21be
JPN: 漁師さんだからちょっとはたくましいんだろうけど、俺だって部活でそれなりに鍛えている。
ENG: He might be just a bit on the sturdy side 'cause he's a fisherman, but I'm no slouch either, thanks to my club.

LABEL: 0x2222
ENG: Not that I've actually gone to said club for a year now, but still.

LABEL: 0x224e
JPN: 元気はつらつの若者が、何を恐れるというんだ。
ENG: What's a spunky young guy got to fear in a situation like this?

LABEL: 0x2376
JPN: 筋肉隆々でたくましく日に焼けたおじーさんが目の前に座っていた。
ENG: In front of my eyes―like, seriously, right in front of them―was a sun-baked, muscle-bound old man.

LABEL: 0x24a6
JPN: 俺はつい、聞き返してしまった。
ENG: It popped out before I could stop myself.

LABEL: 0x24d4
JPN: なんというか、そのギャップに。
ENG: The irony of the name just kinda caught me off guard.

LABEL: 0x2536
ENG: His glare felt like it was burning a hole in my face.

LABEL: 0x257a
JPN: 「失礼ですが、おいくつですか」
ENG: "Forgive my rudeness, but how old are you, sir?"

LABEL: 0x2614
JPN: というレベルじゃない。
ENG: Yeah, right. I didn't even know where to start with him.

LABEL: 0x263a
JPN: ランニングの下にはよく日焼けした鋼鉄の鎧のような肉体が盛り上がっている。
ENG: His well-tanned muscles almost looked like steel beams bulging out from beneath his tank top.

LABEL: 0x2692
JPN: さらに気になるのは、その肉体につけられたいくつもの古傷で……
ENG: And even more attention-grabbing were the countless scars all over his body...

LABEL: 0x27aa
JPN: 「気になるのもしょうがない」

LABEL: 0x27de
ENG: "They're not the sort of scars I'd hesitate to talk about."

LABEL: 0x284c
JPN: 「これは裏の森で猪と取っ組み合ったとき」
ENG: "This is from when I wrestled a wild boar in the depths of the forest."

LABEL: 0x288c
JPN: 「これは東北を旅している時に熊と取っ組み合ったとき」
ENG: "This is from when I wrestled a bear during my journey across northeastern Japan."

LABEL: 0x28d8
JPN: 「いろいろと取っ組み合うんですね」
ENG: "You've sure wrestled a lot of stuff, huh?"

LABEL: 0x2c9c
JPN: 「それで今日はどういった用で？」

LABEL: 0x2cd4
JPN: 「祭りにある、夏鳥の儀で彼女は……大事な役目を務めることになっているとか」
ENG: "I heard that Shiroha has been given an extremely important role for the summer festival. The Flight of the Summer Bird, right?"

LABEL: 0x2d38
ENG: "The role of the Summer Bird, yes."

LABEL: 0x2d60
JPN: 「どうしてまた彼女がそんなことを？」

LABEL: 0x2d9e
JPN: 「失礼ですが、そういうことにはあまり向いていないように見えますが」
ENG: "This might seem a little rude, but I don't think she's really cut out for stuff like this."

LABEL: 0x2ec8
JPN: 「あの……ぼっちとか……言わないで……」

LABEL: 0x2f30
JPN: 「どういうことだ、しろは。ありがたくも、大事な役目をもらえることになったというのに」
ENG: "What's the meaning of this, Shiroha? You should be thankful that you've been given the chance to perform in such an important role."

LABEL: 0x3020
JPN: 「そんなお役目やりたくないし、頼んでもない。おじーちゃんが勝手に……」
ENG: "I never wanted a role like this, and I didn't ask for it! You decided it all for me..."

LABEL: 0x313c
JPN: 「お前……学校に行ってないそうじゃないか」
ENG: "I've heard... You haven't been going to school, have you?"

LABEL: 0x31d4
JPN: 「行く振りだけして、ぶらぶらと遊んでいたらしいじゃないか」
ENG: "You've been pretending to go, and wasting your time wandering around the island instead."

LABEL: 0x3280
JPN: 「おまけに、どこの誰とも知れない男とつるむようになって」
ENG: "And on top of that, you've been flirting around with some nameless boy who popped up from god knows where."

LABEL: 0x33ac
JPN: 「彼女がぼっちなのには理由があるんですっ」
ENG: "There's a good reason why she's such a loner!"

LABEL: 0x3422
JPN: 「そりゃあ、性格にも問題はあると思いますが」
ENG: "Well, honestly, I think her personality's part of the problem, too."

LABEL: 0x3628
ENG: "But that's not all there is to it."

LABEL: 0x3658
ENG: "It's, uh... How do I explain this...?"

LABEL: 0x368e
JPN: 「彼女は人に訪れる災いというか未来というか」
ENG: "Because she can predict, like, disasters? Or futures, I guess?"

LABEL: 0x3704
JPN: 「そういうものを予知できるんじゃないかって……それで……」
ENG: "Whatever they are, she can kinda tell when they're going to happen. And that's how..."

LABEL: 0x3758
JPN: 「……儀式で悪いことが起こるって」
ENG: "...She knows something bad will happen during the ceremony."

LABEL: 0x37f6
JPN: 「お前もあんなくだらない噂を本気にするか」
ENG: "Have you been brainwashed by that worthless rumor, too!?"

LABEL: 0x3838
ENG: "On an island as small as this..."

LABEL: 0x385e
ENG: "Foolish rumors spread without so much as a shred of accountability!"

LABEL: 0x38a0
JPN: 「迷信好きな老人がそれを信じる」
ENG: "And then, all those superstitious old farts believe them!"

LABEL: 0x3a02
JPN: 「とにかく彼女には無理です」
ENG: "In any case, she can't do it."

LABEL: 0x3a48
JPN: 「小僧、いったいなんなんだ。よそ者が、大事な祭りに口を出そうとは」
ENG: "What are you trying to pull, brat? What makes you think an outsider like you has any say in what happens during our most important festival?"

LABEL: 0x3aa2
JPN: 「彼女は不安がっています。祭りの日に何かが起こるんじゃないかと」
ENG: "Shiroha's scared. She thinks something might happen on the night of the festival."

LABEL: 0x3b0c
JPN: 「おおかた、お前が何か怪しいことを吹き込んだんだろう」
ENG: "You probably put some weird ideas into her head, didn't you?"

LABEL: 0x3b6a
JPN: 「聞いてるぞ。町からやってきた少年は、あやしげなオカルト話が大好きとか」
ENG: "I've heard all about it. About how the new boy from the city really likes the occult, and such."

LABEL: 0x3c0e
JPN: 「妙なことを吹き込んで、孫をおびえさせたな」
ENG: "You put some weird ideas into my granddaughter's head just so you could frighten her."

LABEL: 0x3c52
JPN: 「島から出て行ってもらおうか」
ENG: "Think you could leave the island yourself and spare me the trouble?"

LABEL: 0x3cb8
ENG: "In that case, I'll just have to chase you out."

LABEL: 0x3d2c
ENG: "I'll throw you off of this island myself."

LABEL: 0x3d5e
JPN: おもむろにじーさんが立ち上がる。

LABEL: 0x3d8e
JPN: 想像以上の巨体に圧倒される。
ENG: His body, and the pressure it exuded, was even larger than I'd originally imagined.

LABEL: 0x3e06
JPN: 「そこまで言うなら、俺も、手加減はしません」
ENG: "If you'd go that far, then I won't hold back either."

LABEL: 0x3e7c
JPN: 「そっちこそ殴り合いで、入れ歯がぶっこわれても弁償なんて言わないで下さいね」
ENG: "You'd better not come crying to me for compensation when I punch your dentures apart, all right?"

LABEL: 0x3f18
JPN: 「はやまるな。そんな物騒なことはしない」
ENG: "Don't get ahead of yourself. I won't be doing anything that violent."

LABEL: 0x3f68
JPN: 「島に伝わる伝統的な方法で勝負を決しようじゃないか」
ENG: "We'll settle things with a traditional contest passed down on this island."

LABEL: 0x406e
JPN: やってきたのは港近くの浜辺だ。
ENG: He brought me out to a beach near the harbor.

LABEL: 0x4128
JPN: まったく勝ち目がない気がする。

LABEL: 0x41e8
JPN: 「海に土俵でも浮かべるんですか」
ENG: "Are we going to set up some kind of floating ring in the water?"

LABEL: 0x4222
ENG: "Or on top of a boat, maybe?"

LABEL: 0x4278
JPN: 「見ろ。うきが円形に浮かんでいるだろう」

LABEL: 0x4300
JPN: 「水中にもロープが下りていて、中からでも、サークルに覆われているのが分かるようになっている」
ENG: "There are ropes hanging from them below the surface, so even when you're underwater, you can tell if you're inside the circle."

LABEL: 0x439a
JPN: 「水中で、相手をあの円から押し出せば勝ちだ」
ENG: "If you push your opponent out of the circle, you$dwin."

LABEL: 0x43de
JPN: 要するに、水中で押し合いへし合いする、と。
ENG: In other words, a sumo wrestling match, but underwater.

LABEL: 0x444c
JPN: 「だいぶ、風変わりな相撲ですね」
ENG: "That sure is a strange form of sumo, huh?"

LABEL: 0x449e
JPN: 「海で強い男こそが、この島では尊敬される」
ENG: "Men who are strong in the sea are respected on this island."

LABEL: 0x44f0
JPN: 「時には、海の神様への奉納の儀として」
ENG: "Sometimes, these duels have been performed as an offering to the god of the ocean."

LABEL: 0x453e
JPN: 「時には、１人の女性をめぐって決着をつけるために」
ENG: "Sometimes, they've been used to resolve a fight over a woman."

LABEL: 0x4588
JPN: 「島の男は、大事なときにはいつも、海で、己の覚悟をしめしてきた」
ENG: "Whenever a serious matter arises, the men of this island have always proven their mettle in the ocean."

LABEL: 0x45f0
JPN: 「そうやって生まれた水中格闘技だ」
ENG: "This underwater dueling ritual has evolved from those ideals."

LABEL: 0x4648
JPN: 「十分物騒だと思うのですが」
ENG: "This actually does sound plenty violent, for the record."

LABEL: 0x4754
JPN: 「なんでこの小僧にそこまで肩入れする」
ENG: "Why are you going so far to stand up for this brat?"

LABEL: 0x493c
JPN: 「羽依里は、小学校のプールでも溺れるほどなんだから」
ENG: "Hairi's so bad with water, he almost drowned in an elementary school pool!"

LABEL: 0x4a04
JPN: 「小学校のプールで溺れるのか」
ENG: "You really almost drowned in an elementary school pool?"

LABEL: 0x4a74
ENG: "Then you really aren't cut out for this, are you?"

LABEL: 0x4ace
JPN: 「あれは脚がつっただけだって」
ENG: "I got a cramp in my leg back then, that's all."

LABEL: 0x4c38
JPN: 「気持ちはうれしいんだけど」
ENG: "Look, I'm glad you feel that way."

LABEL: 0x4c6e
JPN: 「男と男が話し合ってるときに女の子が入ってきた時は、男は毅然と言うべきものかなーって」
ENG: "It's just, like, when guys are doing the guy-talk thing and a girl cuts in, we're supposed to act all tough about it, y'know?"

LABEL: 0x4e24
JPN: 「外からやってきた僕ちゃんが、鳴瀬のお嬢様に手を出したから」
ENG: "The boy from the mainland laid hands on Naruse's granddaughter, y'see."

LABEL: 0x4eb0
JPN: 「祭りも近いのに、海で血が流れるのはどうなんでしょう」
ENG: "I'm not so sure about them sullying the sea with blood this close to the festival."

LABEL: 0x4f00
JPN: どこから聞きつけたのか、ギャラリーが集まり始めていた。
ENG: I had no idea how they got wind of our contest, but a crowd of onlookers began to gradually assemble.

LABEL: 0x4f6c
JPN: なんか、大事になってきた……

LABEL: 0x4f98
JPN: 娯楽に飢えている島民達が集まってきたらしい。
ENG: Apparently the islanders were really starved for entertainment.

LABEL: 0x4fd4
ENG: Someone even set up a food stall.

LABEL: 0x50c4
ENG: And by someone, I mean Ryouichi.

LABEL: 0x51e0
ENG: "Yeah, a large helping of 'what the hell?'"

LABEL: 0x5212
ENG: "What happened to your sensitive skin, huh?"

LABEL: 0x528c
JPN: 「お前の危機に、敏感肌とか言ってる場合じゃねぇ」
ENG: "I can't be worrying about my sensitive skin when you're in a pinch!"

LABEL: 0x531c
JPN: 「この勝負、どうみても分が悪い」
ENG: "No matter how you look at it, you're at a disadvantage in this contest."

LABEL: 0x5364
JPN: 「勝機があるとしたら、チームワークだな」
ENG: "If you have any hope of victory, it lies in teamwork."

LABEL: 0x53b4
ENG: "I'll give you orders from the shore."

LABEL: 0x5408
ENG: "Where have you been this whole time?"

LABEL: 0x5448
JPN: 「いや決戦に備えて、みのむし腹筋に励んでいたんだが」
ENG: "I was training myself for the decisive battle by doing hanging sit-ups."

LABEL: 0x54a4
JPN: 「きつく縛りすぎて、脱出するのに難儀していた」
ENG: "...And I tied the rope too tight. It took no small effort to disentangle myself."

LABEL: 0x5520
JPN: 「しかし分の悪い勝負を受けたな」
ENG: "You really have taken on quite the unfavorable duel, though."

LABEL: 0x5590
ENG: "I've experienced one of these duels, myself."

LABEL: 0x55fe
JPN: 「あぁ多少なりとも援護はできる」
ENG: "Yes. At the very least, I can help guide you through the match."

LABEL: 0x5646
JPN: 「俺の指示通りにやれば、なんとかなるかもしれん」
ENG: "If you do as I say, we might be able to pull this off."

LABEL: 0x568e
JPN: 「指示を出してくれるって言うが」
ENG: "You say you're going to give me instructions, but..."

LABEL: 0x57e6
ENG: I looked out at the ocean.

LABEL: 0x5804
JPN: 浜辺には大勢の観客がいる。
ENG: A crowd of onlookers was gathered on the beach.

LABEL: 0x582e
JPN: 先日、プールで泳ぐことが出来た。
ENG: I'd managed to swim in the pool just the other day.

LABEL: 0x585e
JPN: けど……すぐまた溺れてしまった。
ENG: But... I almost drowned soon thereafter.

LABEL: 0x588e
JPN: 今回は、海だ。何かあったらしゃれにならない。
ENG: This time, I'd be in the ocean. If anything went wrong, it wouldn't end well for me.

LABEL: 0x58ca
JPN: でもだからこそ、試したかった。
ENG: But that just gave me all the more reason to test myself.

LABEL: 0x58f8
ENG: A lot of things made sense, all of a sudden.

LABEL: 0x5914
JPN: 結局、きっかけが欲しかっただけなんだ。
ENG: In the end, all I really wanted was a reason.

LABEL: 0x594a
JPN: しろはの事情にかこつけて、俺はただ、望んでいたんだろうか。
ENG: Maybe I was just using Shiroha's circumstances as a means to get what I really wanted.

LABEL: 0x5994
ENG: A reason to dive back into the water.

LABEL: 0x59ba
JPN: あるいは、島に来た理由も、彼女と友達になった理由も。
ENG: Or maybe that's why I came to this island in the first place; why I made friends with her at all.

LABEL: 0x59fe
JPN: 全部、同じところに通じてる。
ENG: All those roads led to the same conclusion.

LABEL: 0x5a2a
JPN: 俺は、結局、戻りたかった。
ENG: In the end, all I wanted was to get back into the water.

LABEL: 0x5ae6
JPN: 笛が鳴り、俺とじーさんが海に潜る。
ENG: The whistle blew. Shiroha's grandfather and I dove into the water.

LABEL: 0x5b84
JPN: 水中で、しろはのじーさんと対峙する。
ENG: I squared off against him underwater.

LABEL: 0x5bf2
JPN: 水中でも気持ちは落ち着いている。しっかりと目を開くことができた。
ENG: I was calm, even in the water. My eyes were wide open.

LABEL: 0x5c42
JPN: というか、目の前のじーさんが恐ろしすぎて、そっちのほうが気になる。
ENG: Actually, Shiroha's terrifying grandfather was way more worrying than the water―not to mention right in front of me.

LABEL: 0x5c94
JPN: 海中で体を広げると、小鳩さんの体はいっそうでかく見える。
ENG: He looked even bigger than ever with his limbs splayed out underwater.

LABEL: 0x5cdc
JPN: まさに海獣でも相手にしているようだ。
ENG: It felt like I was staring down a natural-born sea beast.

LABEL: 0x5d10
JPN: あと、サークルをとりまいて観戦しているダイバー達が、けっこうシュールで怖い。
ENG: A bunch of other divers were swimming around the arena to watch us, too, which made the whole thing even more surreal in a kinda scary way.

LABEL: 0x5d92
JPN: 頭の中で、事前に説明されたルールを繰り返す。
ENG: I thought through the rules I'd been told.

LABEL: 0x5dce
JPN: 急所攻撃以外はなんでもあり。
ENG: Aside from targeting the vitals, anything goes.

LABEL: 0x5dfa
JPN: とにかく指定のサークルから押し出せば、勝ち。
ENG: If you force your opponent out of the circle you win, no matter how you do it.

LABEL: 0x5e36
JPN: おおざっぱなルールではあるが、そんなものだろう。
ENG: The rules were really broad and vague, but I guess that's just how these things go.

LABEL: 0x5e76
JPN: 相撲と言いつつ、打撃もありの、格闘技というわけか。
ENG: It was sort of a weird cross between sumo and a martial art.

LABEL: 0x5eb8
JPN: 打撃といっても、海中じゃあ、力も入らないだろうけど……
ENG: Though even if we're allowed to throw punches, it's not like they'll have much force behind them underwater.

LABEL: 0x5f72
JPN: って！　じーさん、すごい勢いで突っ込んできた!?
ENG: ...Wait holy crap, how's he charging that quickly!?

LABEL: 0x6036
JPN: 思いっきり、腹を殴られた!?
ENG: He punched me in the stomach with all his might.

LABEL: 0x60e0
JPN: 水中なのに、あの衝撃は……一体……
ENG: How the hell did he put that much force into it underwater...?

LABEL: 0x6112
JPN: そもそもみぞおちは、普通に、急所……
ENG: Also, doesn't the solar plexus count as part of your vitals!?

LABEL: 0x6182
ENG: I couldn't hold in my breath.

LABEL: 0x621e
JPN: 「がぼん（ギブアップをしても）」

LABEL: 0x6256
JPN: 何か言ってる。だいたい、言いたいことは想像できた。
ENG: He seemed to be saying something, and I could pretty much imagine what it was.

LABEL: 0x6298
JPN: このじーさん、押しだそうと思えばできるのに。
ENG: I knew he could probably push me out by force, if he really wanted to.

LABEL: 0x62d4
JPN: あえて俺をギブアップに追い込む気だ。
ENG: But no, he was set on making me give up myself.

LABEL: 0x6346
JPN: 誰が、ギブアップなんて……
ENG: As if I'd ever give up...

LABEL: 0x63fc
ENG: I was sinking deeper and deeper.

LABEL: 0x6522
JPN: 水面の向こうで、太陽の光を受けてきらめく輝きを見ていた。
ENG: The surface of the water above me caught the sun's rays, sparkling with a blinding light.

LABEL: 0x656a
JPN: あのまぶしさを知っている。
ENG: I've seen that brilliance somewhere before.

LABEL: 0x6594
ENG: It was the light of a summer vacation filled with fun.

LABEL: 0x65d2
JPN: 手を伸ばして掴みたかった。
ENG: I wanted to reach out and grasp it.

LABEL: 0x6642
ENG: ──This is all your fault, isn't it?

LABEL: 0x66a6
JPN: 俺の、せい、なんだろうか。

LABEL: 0x66d0
JPN: そうなのかもしれない。

LABEL: 0x671a
JPN: ただ、窒息しそうな空気に包まれて、俺はあの夏から溺れ続けていた。
ENG: I'd been struggling away from that summer since long ago, suffocated as its atmosphere engulfed me.

LABEL: 0x67dc
JPN: 別の声を聞いた気がした。
ENG: I thought I heard a different voice.

LABEL: 0x68e2
JPN: かわされる無責任な、噂。
ENG: Irresponsible rumors were thrown about with wild abandon.

LABEL: 0x690a
JPN: その中心に、彼女がいた。
ENG: And at the heart of the storm, there she was.

LABEL: 0x6a36
ENG: Ahh... So she's just like me.

LABEL: 0x6a58
ENG: Unable to speak out, to fight back.

LABEL: 0x6a7a
JPN: 窒息しそうな空気の中に、彼女も沈んでいた。
ENG: She was also struggling to breathe as she sunk beneath the waves.

LABEL: 0x6ace
JPN: ちょっとだけ、似ていた。

LABEL: 0x6af6
JPN: だから、きっと声をかけて……
ENG: That's why, even as the voices called out...

LABEL: 0x6bc2
ENG: I couldn't tell them that they were wrong.

LABEL: 0x6be6
ENG: I had no words to fight back with.

LABEL: 0x6cfe
JPN: それでも、俺達は窒息しそうな夏の中で。
ENG: But still, even as we suffocated in that summer...

LABEL: 0x6d34
ENG: We'd struggle with all our might.

LABEL: 0x6d56
ENG: We'd reach out for the light.

LABEL: 0x6d7c
ENG: And we'd reach the surface, together.

LABEL: 0x6e8e
JPN: 飛びかけていた意識が戻ってくる。
ENG: My fading consciousness sprang back to life.

LABEL: 0x6ee2
JPN: 俺はしっかりと、目の前の相手をにらみ据えた。
ENG: I gave my opponent a sharp, resolute glare.

LABEL: 0x6f44
JPN: 「がぼぼ（何か、企んでいる顔だな）」
ENG: "Bleorboraboarborough. (You look like you've got something up your sleeve.)"

LABEL: 0x6fa6
JPN: 「がぼぼぼ（ならば決めてやる）」
ENG: "Blougbueoaboagh! (Fine, then. I'll settle this here and now!)"

LABEL: 0x6fde
JPN: けりをつけるつもりらしい。
ENG: I could tell he was planning to finish me off.

LABEL: 0x702e
JPN: 「がぼぼぼぼぼ！（お前は、ここから出て行け!!）」
ENG: "Blerubough, bloueroaboduoagough! (Get the hell off of this island, and never come back!)"

LABEL: 0x709a
JPN: 何を言っているのか分からないが、想像はつく。
ENG: I couldn't tell what he was saying, but I could more or less guess.

LABEL: 0x7116
JPN: 「がぼぼ（なにも見ていないくせに）」
ENG: "Bleuurogoobloeorough...! (Talking yourself up, even though you won't open your damn eyes to the truth!)"

LABEL: 0x7154
JPN: 「がぼぼぼぼぼ（あんたの孫が、１人でいるとき、どんな顔をしているかも知らないくせに）」
ENG: "Bloouoougagouroughbroguoguhoaho...! (Even though you have no idea what sort of face your granddaughter makes when she's alone!)"

LABEL: 0x729c
JPN: 「がぼぼ（ここにきて命乞いか）」
ENG: "Blerougough, blouroughahh. (To think you'd plead for your life after coming this far...)"

LABEL: 0x72d4
JPN: 「がぼぼぼぼぼぼ（長く生きてるってのがそんなに偉いのかよ）」
ENG: "Bloerougoharougouhogha...!? (What, you think living a long life makes you so damn special!?)"

LABEL: 0x732a
JPN: 「がぼぼぼぼ（いっそ、小学生からやり直せよ）」
ENG: "Blauroughouoagouh! (Sounds like someone needs to start over from elementary school!)"

LABEL: 0x7430
JPN: 「がぼぼぼぼ！（今更泣いて謝っても遅い!!）」
ENG: "Bleuaghoghabloughgha! (Cry all you like, it's too late to apologize now!)"

LABEL: 0x74fa
JPN: 「がぼおおおおおおおおおおおお!!（終わりだあああああああああああ!!）」

LABEL: 0x755c
JPN: じーさんが突進してくる。

LABEL: 0x75a2
JPN: 俺はそのままサークルの際まで押し込まれ……
ENG: I let him push me to the edge of the circle...

LABEL: 0x75dc
JPN: バク転をするように、一回転する。
ENG: Before suddenly kicking upwards into a spin, like I was doing a backflip.

LABEL: 0x76b2
JPN: 「がぼっ（あれは）」$d$w「ごぼっ（あれは）」$d$w「ぼぼっ（あれは）」

LABEL: 0x77ce
JPN: $S048「ぬおおおおおおおおおおおおおおおおお」$S

LABEL: 0x781c
JPN: 加速のついた巨体は、そのままサークルの外へ。
ENG: Unable to overcome his own momentum, he sailed out of the circle.

LABEL: 0x7b44
JPN: 良一のがっしりとした腕が、俺を受け止めた。
ENG: I caught one of Ryouichi's sturdy arms.

LABEL: 0x7d06
JPN: 「大丈夫だ。少し話をするだけだ」
ENG: "Don't worry. I just want to talk."

LABEL: 0x7e00
ENG: "Let's hear what you have to say."

LABEL: 0x7ec2
JPN: 「どうせ信じてもらえないといった顔だな」
ENG: "I can tell you think I won't believe you, no matter what you say."

LABEL: 0x7f5c
JPN: 「どうせ信じてもらえないような話を、お前にはしたわけだな。あの子は」
ENG: "She actually decided to tell you a story that unbelievable."

LABEL: 0x7fc8
JPN: 「唯一の肉親のわしにはせずに」
ENG: "A story she never even told to her only remaining blood relative."

LABEL: 0x7ffe
JPN: 「家族だからできない話はあります」
ENG: "Some things are hard to talk about with your family precisely because they're your family."

LABEL: 0x803a
JPN: 口にした言葉は、自分でも驚くくらい、実感がこもっていた。
ENG: I almost surprised myself with how genuine my words sounded.

LABEL: 0x80f8
JPN: 「仮にお前らの言うことが本当だとしても」
ENG: "Suppose I were to believe everything you've told me."

LABEL: 0x8138
JPN: 「それは役目を降りることで解消することなのか」
ENG: "Could you really avoid it by just finding another person to fill in for her role?"

LABEL: 0x81b6
JPN: 「でも、出来るだけのことはしたいでしょう」
ENG: "But you'd want to do everything you possibly could, right?"

LABEL: 0x823c
JPN: 「その出来るだけが、役目を降りることなのかの」
ENG: "And that 'everything you could' is having her step down?"

LABEL: 0x82b2
JPN: 「しろはのことはわしも知っている」

LABEL: 0x82ec
JPN: 「同年代の友達の間で、よくない噂を立てられているとか」
ENG: "I know about the unsavory rumors her peers have spread about her."

LABEL: 0x8368
JPN: 「ちゃんと説明をしないからだ」
ENG: "They spread because she never properly explains herself."

LABEL: 0x83ae
ENG: "She never tells people when they're wrong."

LABEL: 0x83dc
JPN: 「そういう性格じゃないじゃないですか」
ENG: "That's just the sort of person she is, though, right?"

LABEL: 0x8450
JPN: 「ずっと、わしもそう思っていた」

LABEL: 0x8498
ENG: "'That's just the sort of person she is.'"

LABEL: 0x84c6
JPN: 「可哀相だから。両親がいないから。しょうがないと」
ENG: "'It's such a pity.' 'If only her parents were here for her.' 'You can't blame her.'"

LABEL: 0x8548
JPN: 「１０年前の夏……あの子は父親と母親を失ってしまった」
ENG: "One summer, ten years ago... She lost both her mother and father."

LABEL: 0x8670
JPN: 「そのときから、ずっとああいう性格だ」

LABEL: 0x8702
ENG: "That's what I thought, and everyone else, too."

LABEL: 0x8734
JPN: 「そうやって長い時間がたった」
ENG: "And so years passed, without any change."

LABEL: 0x8796
JPN: 「毎年、１人で夏を過ごしている」
ENG: "Every year, she would spend her summer alone."

LABEL: 0x88b4
JPN: 「お前さんにはただの祭りと見えるかもしれないが」
ENG: "I'm sure it looks like just another festival to you."

LABEL: 0x88fc
ENG: "But her role is an extremely important one."

LABEL: 0x893e
JPN: 「祖先を供養し、御霊を鎮めるための厳かなものだ」
ENG: "It's a revered ceremony that serves as both a memorial for our ancestors and an offering to the spirits of the dead."

LABEL: 0x8986
JPN: 「それで慰められるものが、この島にはまだ大勢いる」
ENG: "Many of the islanders rely on that ceremony for closure and comfort."

LABEL: 0x89d0
JPN: 「儀式がうまくいかなければ、それを不吉の兆候と思い、災いが起こると信じている者がいる」
ENG: "There are those who would take it as a sign of impending calamity if the ceremony falls apart."

LABEL: 0x8a84
JPN: 「孫が危険な目に遭うとしても役目を全うさせようとする、ひどい老人だと思うか」
ENG: "You think I'm a horrible old man who would do anything for the sake of tradition, even if it means putting my own granddaughter in danger?"

LABEL: 0x8b46
JPN: 思ってしまうが、この人は俺以上にしろはを知っていて、しろはのことを考えている。
ENG: I did, but it also struck me that he knew Shiroha even better than I did, and was thinking of her even more than I was.

LABEL: 0x8ba4
JPN: そんな当たり前のことに、俺は今更思い当たっていた。
ENG: It was obvious, but it took me until that moment to realize it.

LABEL: 0x8be6
JPN: しろはのために、なんて舞い上がっていたけど、俺は実のところ、何も知らないんだ。
ENG: I ran my mouth about how it was all for Shiroha's sake, but in actuality, I knew nothing.

LABEL: 0x8c8c
JPN: 「いずれにしてもわしは負けたのだ」

LABEL: 0x8cc6
JPN: 「後はお前達の好きにしたらいい」
ENG: "You brats can go ahead and do whatever you want."

LABEL: 0x8d88
JPN: じーさんの話を聞きながら、俺の中でも釈然としないものが生まれていた。
ENG: As he spoke, I felt a feeling of dissatisfaction grow within me.

LABEL: 0x8ddc
JPN: それでいいのだろうか。

LABEL: 0x8e02
JPN: 何かもっと根本的な解決が必要なのかもしれない。
ENG: It could be that we still haven't addressed the issue on a fundamental level.

LABEL: 0x8e40
JPN: 俺が島を去った後も、しろははおかしな悩みや噂に悩まずに、皆と仲良くしてほしい。
ENG: I wanted Shiroha to be able to get along with everyone without being burdened by weird worries and rumors, even after I left the island.

LABEL: 0x8eb6
JPN: 俺はなんでこんなに必死なんだ。
ENG: Why am I so determined to do this?

LABEL: 0x8f74
JPN: 「まぁ、男と男、拳を交わらせれば、友と言えるのかもしれないな」
ENG: "Well, I suppose that once you've traded blows with a fellow man, it's only natural to call him a friend."

LABEL: 0x8fec
JPN: なぜかじーさんが照れていた。
ENG: For some reason, he looked a bit bashful.

LABEL: 0x902a
JPN: 友達だから？　親切心？
ENG: Is it because we're friends? Am I doing it just to be nice?

LABEL: 0x90e0
JPN: 「そこまで思われても、困るが」

LABEL: 0x9190
JPN: これは、俺自身の都合なんだ。
ENG: This is just my own self-interest at work.

LABEL: 0x91bc
JPN: 俺は、あるいはしろはに自分を重ねているだけなのかもしれない。
ENG: I might just be projecting myself onto Shiroha's problems.

LABEL: 0x9208
JPN: 逃げて逃げて、ついに居場所を失った自分を。
ENG: I saw a part of myself in her―the part that kept running and running, until finally I had nowhere to go home to.

LABEL: 0x9242
JPN: 自分ができなかったことを、しろはにして欲しくて。
ENG: I wanted to help Shiroha do what I couldn't.

LABEL: 0x9282
JPN: そうしたら俺にも、出来るような気がして。
ENG: If she did, then maybe I could do it, too.

LABEL: 0x92d8
JPN: いずれにしても、選ぶのは、しろはか。
ENG: In the end, Shiroha has to make that decision herself.

LABEL: 0x9346
JPN: 「儀式はやるべきなのかもしれません」
ENG: "Maybe we should go through with the ceremony after all."

LABEL: 0x9384
ENG: "But if we do, we need to do something else to protect her."

LABEL: 0x940e
JPN: 「当日、俺も彼女の隣にいさせてください」

LABEL: 0x94ea
JPN: じーさんはしばらく考え込む。
ENG: He gave the idea some thought.

LABEL: 0x9552
ENG: "Her role is extremely important to the ceremony."

LABEL: 0x9584
JPN: 「外から来た人間が言ったからって、ほいほい演目を変えられるものじゃない」
ENG: "It's not something we can change easily on the word of some random outsider."

LABEL: 0x965a
JPN: 「役目に付き添いがついたことがないわけではないが」
ENG: "It's not like there's no precedent whatsoever for having someone accompany the Summer Bird."

LABEL: 0x96a4
JPN: 「ただ仮につくとしても、それは肉親に限られている」
ENG: "But even so, those rare exceptions have all been limited to the performer's family."

LABEL: 0x9714
ENG: "Couldn't you make some kind of exception?"

LABEL: 0x974a
JPN: 「例えば兄ということにして」
ENG: "Maybe you could pass me off as her older brother, or something?"

LABEL: 0x9876
JPN: 「一つ、方法がないわけでもない」

LABEL: 0x9a4c
JPN: じーさんとの話を終えて、しろはと、プールで落ち合った。
ENG: After finishing my conversation with Shiroha's grandfather, I met up with her at the pool.

LABEL: 0x9a92
JPN: 俺の結論に、しろはは静かに頷いた。
ENG: Shiroha listened to my explanation, and nodded silently, agreeing with my conclusion.

LABEL: 0x9ac4
JPN: 「そのかわり俺も一緒に舟の先導をする」
ENG: "But that doesn't mean we're giving up. I'll be guiding the boat with you."

LABEL: 0x9b14
ENG: "You'll play the role of the Summer Bird, too?"

LABEL: 0x9b7a
JPN: 「よくおじーちゃんが許したね」
ENG: "I can't believe he agreed to that."

LABEL: 0x9bd8
ENG: "Well, I mean, there was one condition."

LABEL: 0x9c3c
JPN: 「肉親じゃなければならないそうだ」

LABEL: 0x9dda
JPN: 「肉親ということにするしかないと」

LABEL: 0x9e78
JPN: はっと俺を見て、少し目をそらしながら、
ENG: Then she gave me a sort of shocked look, and glanced awkwardly off to the side.

LABEL: 0x9eee
JPN: 「いや、それは、かりそめでも無理だろ」
ENG: "Nope, temporary or not, that's not gonna fly."

LABEL: 0x9f2e
ENG: "I'm saying we have to, well, y'know."

LABEL: 0x9f58
JPN: 「儀式の日に、神社で、誓いを立てて」
ENG: "On the day of the ceremony, if we exchange oaths at the shrine..."

LABEL: 0x9fc8
JPN: 「かりそめの、夫婦ということにしたらどうかって……」
ENG: "We can pass ourselves off as a married couple, temporarily."

LABEL: 0xa0c2
JPN: 「えええええええええええええ」

LABEL: 0xa0fa
JPN: 「だだだだだ、ダメだよ、そんなの」

LABEL: 0xa154
JPN: 「あくまで儀礼的なものだとか」
ENG: "It'd just be for the ceremony! It wouldn't really mean anything."

LABEL: 0xa18c
JPN: 「本当に夫婦になるとかじゃないから。はは」
ENG: "We won't really be getting married at all! Hahah..."

LABEL: 0xa3dc
ENG: "I'd never think of you as a problem."

LABEL: 0xa41e
JPN: 「だって冗談でも、そういうのは」
ENG: "But even if it's a joke, this is too much."

LABEL: 0xa498
JPN: 「神様に誓うんだから、まねごとじゃすまないよ」
ENG: "We'd be making our oaths to the gods. Pretending won't work."

LABEL: 0xa504
JPN: 「俺は外から来たから、そういうのに、ちょっといい加減なんだろうな」
ENG: "I'm an outsider, so stuff like that doesn't really register with me."

LABEL: 0xa560
JPN: 「気軽に考えすぎてたかもしれないな」
ENG: "I might've been taking this too lightly."

LABEL: 0xa6ba
JPN: 「しろはに感謝をしているんだ」
ENG: "I've got a lot to thank you for."

LABEL: 0xa786
JPN: 「なんといったらいいか。難しいな」
ENG: "How do I say this? This is so hard..."

LABEL: 0xa7e6
JPN: そのまま言葉にしたら、えらく、くさくなるような気がした。
ENG: I felt like I'd come off as pretentious, or at the very least super lame, if I straight up said what I was thinking.

LABEL: 0xa860
ENG: "I'll try to say it properly, next time."

LABEL: 0xa8c0
JPN: 「とにかく、そういうことだから」
ENG: "At any rate, that's how it is."

LABEL: 0xa924
JPN: 「もししろはに危険が迫ってるなら」
ENG: "If there's some kind of danger closing in on you, Shiroha..."

LABEL: 0xa960
ENG: "Then I want to be as close to you as I can possibly be, so I can help when the time comes."

LABEL: 0xa990
JPN: 「それは俺の勝手な、考えだけど」

LABEL: 0xaa7e
ENG: "If I really won't be causing you any trouble..."

LABEL: 0xaae2
JPN: 「本当に本当に迷惑じゃないなら」
ENG: "If I really, really, won't be causing you any trouble..."
